alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:50PM CDT until June 03 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pineville to near Poland, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Cheneyville, Lecompte, Echo, Poland, Kolin, Ruby, Woodworth and Forest Hill. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 87. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
